title: 100 Years of Cinema Music - 5 Volumes
description:
100 Years of Cinema Music


100 Years of Cinema Music is a landmark celebration offering one of the most comprehensive
package of the greatest musical songs to embrace their names in cinema history. 
A unique choice of memorable songs which are a pleasure to listen and relive the magical
moments of the greatest movies of all time. The list ranges from Dr. Zhivago, Star Wars, 
Gone with the Wind, Out of Africa, My Fair Lady and many many more.
